content: It’s kind of sad to have to scroll through something like 20 pages to find something worth reading. It would be really normal if I just didn’t like the subject or writing style, but most of the things that pop up on my feed are things that I can’t even begin to try describing n any other way than the way you did. So yeah, that gets me a little sad everyday. I don’t think I’m going to donate to anyone any time soon (for several reasons thatI can come up with if I actually need to list them), so I can try adding my voice over here to see if medium does something about it before before this site becomes the worst part of facebook.
